input.sentences: we watched a fire breathing dragon in the parade .
then we watched dancers march by .
the stopped to do a performance .
they carried some of the dancers on their shoulders .
then we watched a lady on stilts pass by .
output.sentences: We watched as the parade passes by, a dragon blazes fire in the air!
We watched as the march continued with beautiful dancers.
We gasped ! The parade suddenly stopped the performance. There was a slip, but everyone was okay!
We were amazed as one girl climbed onto the shoulders of another. The other dancers performed around them as she was carried high in the sky.
At the very end, we watched a group walk by on stilts waving their goodbyes.
